TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A thin, tube-like instrument used to look inside the anus and rectum. A proctoscope has a light and a lens for viewing. It may also have a tool to remove tissue to be checked under a microscope for signs of disease.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Instrumento delgado parecido a un tubo que se usa para observar el interior del ano y el recto. Un proctoscopio tiene una luz y una lente para observar.
